metadata.description: Budget-based item generation configuration - controls how budget is allocated across item components

budgetAllocation.description: Default budget split: 30% material, 70% components (weapons/armor/consumables). componentPercentage auto-calculated as 1.0 - materialPercentage

material.description: Material cost uses budgetCost property directly (higher rarityWeight materials cost more)

component.description: Component cost = 100 / selectionWeight (rarer components cost more budget)

enchantment.description: Enchantment cost = 130 / selectionWeight (enchantments are more valuable than regular components)

materialQuality.description: Material quality cost = 150 / selectionWeight (quality modifiers are premium)
